short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide NBA Scores from Motion Station recaps on YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your YouTube experience with 'Hide NBA Scores'! Say goodbye to spoilers and enjoy NBA content on YouTube without knowing the scores beforehand. Our extension discreetly conceals NBA scores from Motion Station recaps, ensuring every game feels fresh and exciting. Elevate your viewing pleasure and immerse yourself in the action without fear of spoilers. Install now and rediscover the thrill of every NBA game!
